channel.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
channel.description:
Well, what did you get?
I didn't bother getting any, instead I got a 150€ Johny Walker blue label.

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Eh, I never get any for new years. Plus it was cold as shit, so there wasn’t really a point.

For 4th of July I always load up though. Me and my friends always get like 5000 cheap ass firecrackers and bottle rockets, three 30 packs of keystone light, a quarter of kill and just kick it.

Read full topic
item.source: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:21, topic:323149”][quote author=Lin link=topic=419563.msg3089166#msg3089166 date=1262741695]

The ones that go into the sky and explode.
[/quote][quote author=Adam link=topic=419563.msg3089159#msg3089159 date=1262741505]
Ones that make BIG boom.
[/quote]Your attempts for attention have failed and just make you look like dicks with nothing better to do.

@OP: If you mean for New Year’s, I didn’t get any. But, coming the 4th of July, I’m probably going to get one of those big boxes with tons of stuff in them and loads of firecrackers. Nothing like sticking several in a bucket and watching them explode

If our attempt for attention failed, how come we got your attention?[/quote]
I think he was reading all the posts, and got annoyed at yours :1.

Read full topic
item.source: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?

[quote=“Lin, post:17, topic:323149”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=419563.msg3089141#msg3089141 date=1262740266]

[/quote][quote author=Adam link=topic=419563.msg3089159#msg3089159 date=1262741505]
Ones that make BIG boom.
[/quote]Your attempts for attention have failed and just make you look like dicks with nothing better to do.

@OP: If you mean for New Year’s, I didn’t get any. But, coming the 4th of July, I’m probably going to get one of those big boxes with tons of stuff in them and loads of firecrackers. Nothing like sticking several in a bucket and watching them explode :D[/quote]

If our attempt for attention failed, how come we got your attention?

jme:

Kinda hard to light fireworks during a blizzard

Blizzards are fun though.
I’m just getting sick of shoveling snow.

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

I bought none, although a friend of mine gave me about $20 worth of bottle rockets that I shot from my zipper.

Speljohan:

Obviously none, why spend $150 on fireworks when you can spend $150 on alcohol?

Or mild hallucinogens.

Read full topic

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:14, topic:323149”]The ones that go into the sky and explode.[/quote][quote=“Adam, post:15, topic:323149”]Ones that make BIG boom.[/quote]Your attempts for attention have failed and just make you look like dicks with nothing better to do.

@OP: If you mean for New Year’s, I didn’t get any. But, coming the 4th of July, I’m probably going to get one of those big boxes with tons of stuff in them and loads of firecrackers. Nothing like sticking several in a bucket and watching them explode

item.title: What sorts of fireworks did you purchase?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:323149”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=419563.msg3082716#msg3082716 date=1262280995]
What sorts of fireworks did you purchase? - ones that go up and go bang - ones that spin around
[/quote]
Don’t troll.

I have only purchased fireworks once in my life. I really find it to be a waste of money, even though they are cool for the 3 seconds they are lit.[/quote]

im not trolling, just sarcastic theres a difference
